title: President Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono – People and Organizations – Barack Obama Presidential Library Artifact Collection

quotes: Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono is an Indonesian politician who served two terms as President of Indonesia, from 2004 until 2009.
From 2013 until 2020, he served as the Chairman of the Democratic Party.
